name: 8.5 x 11 Attention
description: 8.5 in. by 11 in. sign for general customer information.

fields.value: Use this paragraph of copy to explain information that benefits the customer. These types of signs are meant for temporary use only. Please use only in circumstances where a team member is unable to communicate to the customer. Please use language that is customer friendly. Do not use all caps or multiple explanation points.
